page.title: 18CLUBS AND CUSTOMS
page.content: { HARPOLE}has many fun activities each year.Here are some of them:they have{Mayday}which involes traditional maypole dancing.This takes place on a bank holiday Monday.This has been quite a recent occurrence.They have a {Rose Queen}every year organized by the primary school to raise money to help the old people.This tradition has been going on for years. They have many clubs and meetings including;{Derby and Jones,boys {brigade,brownies,guides,scouts,garden {shows,dances for the over forties {every month and discos for the younger {people.}They have regular church fetes which raises money for charity for the deaf,blind and disabled etc... also money for the church. There is a fir tree near the edge of Harpole, which was planted in 1953 for the{Queen Elizabeth's Coronation.
